display_long_description:
🧠 Reject Sanity. Embrace the Crawl.

Monkey Crawlers is a terrifying VR horror game that uses Gorilla Tag-style locomotion to put you in the body of a primal creature. No sticks. No buttons. No teleportation. Just your hands… and your fear.

Climb. Crawl. Flee.
You're not chasing — you're being chased.
🕹️ Movement Like No Other

Move using only your arms and hands. Drag yourself through dark corridors, climb out of twisted vents, and sprint across haunted arenas — all with physical, intuitive controls.
☠️ Game Modes

    Survival Mode – Work with others to outlast the horrors… or leave them behind.

    Escape Mode – Solve puzzles and find keys while the entity stalks you.

    Free Play – Hang out, explore, or test your skills in private rooms with friends.

🧟 Terrifying Enemies

Every sound you make attracts the monsters. They hunt by noise, sight, and movement. Stay silent. Stay still. Or run like hell.
🗺️ Haunting Maps to Explore

Explore abandoned labs, nightmarish forests, and underground facilities. Each map is designed for vertical traversal, tight spaces, and panic-inducing encounters.
🎭 Customize Your Monkey

Unlock creepy cosmetics, masks, and skins to personalize your monkey—or monster—look. Express yourself… before it’s too late.
🔥 Crossplay Ready

Join friends across platforms and survive the madness together. Or betray them. We won’t judge.
